channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: Aroundtown 在德国房地产危机中亏损 24.3 亿欧元
item.description:
Aroundtown posts 2.43 billion euro loss amid German property crisis https://t.co/YztkXLBdie pic.twitter.com/NnHBciSaZB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：诺德斯特龙的创始家族再次酝酿收购，但 @sharonlam_ 解释说，要算好这笔账--尤其是如果需要一个追求利润的私募股权合作伙伴来提供部分现金的话--就需要在重振增长的同时坚守价格底线。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Nordstrom’s founding family is again mulling a buyout, but making the math stack up – especially if a profit-hungry private equity partner is needed to stump up some of the cash – requires being firm on price while reigniting growth, @sharonlam_ explains pic.twitter.com/ovzLTn3vHV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 印度航空监管局网站上的一则通知显示，该局已将航空公司采用飞行员休息和值班时间新规定的最后期限推迟到6月1日，但未说明原因或新的目标日期。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
India's aviation watchdog has deferred a June 1 deadline for airlines to adopt new rules on rest and duty times for pilots, a notice on its website showed, without stating a reason or a new target date. More here: https://t.co/pWdLYfGGId

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 外汇市场异常平静，延长了利润丰厚的贸易的寿命，超出了许多人的预期。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
An unusual calm enveloping foreign exchange markets is extending the life of a lucrative trade beyond what many had expected. More here: https://t.co/pE5dI98wQX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 中国电子商务卖家希望在美国的 TikTok Shop 上销售产品，以替代亚马逊，但他们对该短视频应用程序收紧对在该平台上开店的海外卖家的执行规则的举动感到不满。
item.description:
Chinese e-commerce vendors that want to sell products on TikTok Shop in the US as an alternative to Amazon are upset by moves they say the short video app has made to tighten enforcement of its rules for overseas sellers opening shops on the platform https://t.co/C41WgJxEhB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 世界贸易组织专家组认定，澳大利亚在与中国的钢铁产品争端中征收的关税存在缺陷--堪培拉表示接受这一裁决。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
A World Trade Organization panel has found that duties imposed by Australia in a steel products dispute with China were flawed - a ruling that Canberra said it accepted. More here: https://t.co/vlObYSaE5q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：美国连锁百货公司诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）背后的家族正在探索将其私有化。@sharonlam_解释说，既要赢得正在承受亏损的股东的支持，又要承诺足够高的回报，让任何收购伙伴满意，这将是一件非常棘手的事情。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The family behind US department store chain Nordstrom is exploring taking it private. Winning over shareholders nursing losses while promising high enough returns to keep any buyout partners happy will be tricky, @sharonlam_ explains pic.twitter.com/YFYF25O836

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国三大股指在清淡交投中收低，投资者在假期缩短的一周中等待经济数据，以判断美联储的政策路径。更多信息
item.description:
All three major US stock indexes closed lower amid light trading as investors awaited economic data in a holiday-shortened week to gauge the Federal Reserve's policy path. Read more https://t.co/mfTQY0Ewte pic.twitter.com/vhLYXOvS2E

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: Krispy Kreme 表示，随着麦当劳和 Krispy Kreme 试点项目的扩大，到 2026 年底，麦当劳在美国的所有餐厅都能买到 Krispy Kreme 的甜甜圈。更多信息
item.description:
Krispy Kreme said its donuts would be available across McDonald's US restaurants by the end of 2026 as the companies expand a pilot project, sending its shares surging. Read more https://t.co/pMRhMI6WqE pic.twitter.com/Fmk4vMJUOf
